articles.title: Nvidia's game streaming service is now on the iPhone and will let you play Fortnite soon - CNBC
articles.description: Game streaming services from Google, Microsoft and Nvidia have so far been unavailable on iPhones and iPads because of Apple's strict App Store rules.
articles.content:
Nvidiaannounced on Thursday that its GeForce Now game streaming service is now available on iPads and iPhones through the Safari browser.
